snippet.title: How To Play Word Grid | Brand New Word Game By CleverGoat
snippet.description:
We have brought out four brand new daily word games for you to enjoy! In this video I will show you how to play Word Grid!

If you'd like to play Word Grid visit wordgrid.clevergoat.com

Our other games also include
Proximity - proximity.clevergoat.com
Word Grid - wordgrid.clevergoat.com
Categories - categories.clevergoat.com

Give them all a go!
